Human Activity Recognition

```{r}
library(data.table); library(caret); library(ggplot2)
training <- fread("pml-training.csv")
testing <- fread("pml-testing.csv")
dim(training)
```
```{r}
dim(testing)
```

Remove columns containing NAs
```{r}
training <- t(na.omit(t(training)))
training <- training[, -c(1:7)]
toDrop <- c("^kurtosis*","^skewness*","yaw")
training <- training[, -grep(paste(toDrop, collapse = "|"), colnames(training))]

dim(training)
```



```{r}
modFit <- train(classe ~., data=training, method="rf", prox=TRUE)
modFit
```
